causes:
• Too much load from high water temp (should fix itself)
• Fault in motor - won't come down itself
fixes:
• Will fix itself by limitation
• Check or replace motor

causes:
• Faulty capacity solenoid coils
• Limitation stopping capacity increase
fixes:
• Replace capacity solenoid coils
• Check for limitations on screen

causes:
• Lack of water flow through condenser
• Condenser pump inverter not controlling speed properly or condenser valve is not controlling properly
fixes:
• Check the sea inlet valve and strainer is open. Check that condenser pump is running when discharge pressure is high. Check for pump airlock. Check Condenser valve operation
• Have PID settings in PLC and inverter settings checked. Check Condenser Valve
• Reset this alarm on high pressure switch by pushing green button, then reset on touchscreen alarm page
• Check Pressures history page

causes:
• Poor water  flow across cooler
• System low in gas
• Expansion valves are not regulating superheat correctly
• Expansion valve coils have become faulty
• Cooler is partially frozen
fixes:
• Check water strainer. Increase circ pump speed. Reset alarm on touchscreen alarm page
• Check gas level on screen and at pilot receiver, if the system is low it must be leak checked and topped up
• Check settings and expansion valve strainers
• Replace expansion valve coils, check pressures history page
• Flush cooler to thaw out

causes:
• Not enough liquid entering the cooler
• Blocked liquid line strainers
• Burned out coils in expansion valve
fixes:
• Clean the liquid line strainers
• Check expansion valve may need to replace coils

causes:
• Too much liquid entering cooler
• Poor circulation flow
fixes:
• Check expansion valve is not jammed open
• Check sea water strainers
• Check cooler is not frozen

causes:
• Liquid injection not working properly
• Low ammonia liquid level in pilot receiver
fixes:
• Check solenoids on liquid injection line
• Check gas level in system
• Check Temp history screen

causes:
• Discharge temp is not warm enough. Liquid injection could be stuck on or not working properly
• Cooler partially frozen
fixes:
• Check liquid injection solenoid. Check discharge temp sensor
• Thaw cooler by flushing with higher temp water

causes:
• Compressor oil receiver low level
• Compressor oil cold
• Dirty Oil Filter
fixes:
• Check level in oil receiver sight glass. Top up if necessary
• Feel compressor oil sump, it should be warm. If not check oil heater
• Check oil filter differential pressure
• Replace oil Filter and oil. Refer to Howden manual
• Check pressures history screen.

causes: • Compressor cooling is not operating properly
• Compressor cooling is not operating properly

• Compressor motor windings have got too hot
• This alarm shows on inverter.
fixes:
• Check compressor motor
• Check motor amps
